comment.body: Hey Ben, welcome to 0net!
There were some issues, but nothing too serious. I have own hub which needs you to comment out 2 lines of python, but it's themed with ZeroMe wrapped in. (Infinity)
Issues were with joining 2 or more hubs. (multiple profiles)
At this point not really. nofish was separating the display layer (ZeroMe) from the data layer (Merger hubs) but the hubs sync quite well so far.
https://en.support.wordpress.com/markdown-quick-reference/
Yeh, same
Mine is showing 160 users at 577kb. Which folder, or where do you see that?
Nice theme mate!  For code pastes we can add codemirror fairly easily, and most of those are dark themed aswell.
You're meant to keep your own personal stuff private. :P
Howdy!

Good idea or not, someone has to try these things, and it's best to try them when first starting than when there's thousands or more users. I tried pausing Red and Blue on the first day. It causes no errors.
I've had the color hubs paused all day, and only odd thing is that red has unpaused itself throughout the day about 6 or more times. Green and Blue remained paused.
Not my fault. I renamed my merger hub and the lists are not numbered so they conflict. If nofish adds number to the list it's fixed. Simple.
Do i get bug bounty?! :D

The odd thing is that it's just a class name (class="SiteList") ..and having classes with the same name is common (that's what classes are for), but maquette.js (the renderer) is very strict about unique class names.
What error in browser console?

Oh, right. It's same i had yesterday.. "div.SiteList" .. i changed my "merged_type" in content.json and ZeroHello tries to show both lists (Merged: Whatever) but the class name on both is "SiteList" w/o number or name of merged so the renderer stops.

I republished with Merged ZeroMe, but look in Infinity's content.json if your copy is from yesterday. Update if it is. Atm, we can't change the "merged_type" until nofish gives the SiteList a unique identifier.
Yep. Thanks!
Good catch.
just a jpg & hidden demo ;)
Just some 3D if it works.
@tkarita:  there's time delay 15 or more seconds between publishing. locally there's not much that would delay writing that long.
should writing be locked until sync is complete? dumb question.. prolly doesn't know when synced..

Agree. I only mentioned ZeroChess on ZeroMedia and it jumped to 20 or 30 peers, and that can't be ZeroMedia viewers, cos it's only on the main chat for about 12 hours, so there is some amount of sharing between peers going on as well.

I don't think it's a big mystery. Grabbed nearly 300 .bit domains (big appetite) and ZeroVerse (big goal) and is now checking altcoin projects on a certain open source site. Put simply, if we don't live in our parent's basement then there are bills to pay.
"anti-hoarding" ..didn't believe that for a minute.
